1532220.name: Zniw Adventure Soundtrack
1532220.description: This sountrack contains all 23 tracks from Zniw Adventure, including the main OST composed by Denis Comtesse, featuring a wide variety of relaxing, mostly acoustic guitar tracks, as well as all minigame chiptunes created by Kamil 'Pator' Patecki and Karolina Twardosz! Both MP3 and high quality FLAC files included!
